import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{loadAssessments}from'../data';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SavedAssessments=()=>{const[assessments,setAssessments]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{// Load saved assessments
const savedAssessments=loadAssessments();setAssessments(savedAssessments);},[]);const getCategoryClass=category=>{if(category==="Limited Wokeness")return"text-green-600";if(category==="Woke")return"text-yellow-600";if(category==="Very Woke")return"text-red-500";if(category==="Egregiously Woke")return"text-red-700 font-bold";return"";};const handleViewAssessment=id=>{navigate(`/view/${id}`);};const formatDate=dateString=>{const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toLocaleDateString()+' '+date.toLocaleTimeString();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"page-title text-2xl font-bold",children:"Saved Assessments"}),assessments.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500",children:"No saved assessments found."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/new'),className:"btn btn-primary mt-4",children:"Create New Assessment"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:assessments.map(assessment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"assessment-card",onClick:()=>handleViewAssessment(assessment.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"assessment-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"assessment-title",children:assessment.showName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:`assessment-score ${getCategoryClass(assessment.category)}`,children:[assessment.score," (",assessment.category,")"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:formatDate(assessment.date)})]},assessment.id))})]});};export default SavedAssessments;
